arts.ttl: Post Match Reaction: Borussia Dortmund Humiliated by Stuttgart in 5-1 Thrashing
arts.sum: I think it was the fourth goal for Stuttgart, where all ten BVB outfield players were between the cross and the shot. On multiple occasions this season, the opposing team is gifted multiple shots while every Dortmund player scrambles inside our box to defend.

arts.ttl: Sahin and Anton lament lack of "basics" in humiliating loss to Stuttgart
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund trainer Nuri Sahin and BVB defender Waldemar Anton didn't have much of a choice but to keep it somber when conducting their post-match interviews with German broadcaster DAZN on Sunday evening. Both new Dortmund additions admitted that the "basics" from the team weren't there in the 1-5 defeat at the MHP Arena. Anton briefly spoke on the subject of his summer transfer

arts.ttl: Nuri Şahin: “You can’t play like that as Borussia Dortmund.”
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund suffered a calamitous 5-1 defeat at Stuttgart on Sunday afternoon with Nuri Şahin’s side now eighth, five points behind leaders Bayern Munich. Die Schwarzgelben found themselves 2-0 down…
El conjunto de Hoeness pasó por encima del Borussia Dortmund pocos días después de dejar una grata impresión contra el Real Madrid.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart vs Dortmund: Match report, highlights, and analysis - Bundesliga 2024/25
arts.sum: Enzo Millot, El Bilal Touré, and Undav again found the net in the second half, while Serhou Guirassy scored Dortmund's consolation goal against his former club. Ermedin Demirović celebrates his goal with teammate Deniz Undav, highlighting Stuttgart's attacking prowess against Dortmund.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | VfB Stuttgart 5-1 Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: After their European antics in midweek, VfB Stuttgart completely and comfortably beat Borussia Dortmund 5-1 at the MHP Arena in an amazing performance from VfB. The atmosphere at the MHP…

arts.ttl: Dortmund demolished as Stuttgart score five
arts.sum: Arguably the most anticipated game of Bundesliga Matchday 4 pitted VfB Stuttgart against Borussia Dortmund this evening. Nuri Sahin's visitors were swept aside as Stuttgart ran out 5-1 winners.

arts.ttl: Match Reaction | Has Nuri Şahin made Borussia Dortmund a mid-table team?
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart overcame Borussia Dortmund 5-1 in emphatic fashion at the MHP Arena to leapfrog Die Schwarzgelben in the Bundesliga table. Heading into Sunday afternoon, there was uncertainty surrounding what…

arts.ttl: Man Utd to battle Dortmund for breakout Champions League wonderkid
arts.sum: United are aiming to sign young talent under their new regime, having spent big on players like Leny Yoro in the summer, as well as under-the-radar talent such as Sekou Kone, who joined the club’s development team . The 18-year-old joined RB Salzburg last summer and spent the campaign at feeder club Liefering in the second tier of Austria, scoring six times in 22 games.

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: VfB Stuttgart vs. Borussia Dortmund
arts.sum: The lineups for this evening's highly intriguing Bundesliga match-up between two German Champions' League representatives have been confirmed.
